response.overview: Photojournalist Neerav Uprati ventures into the forbidden woods of Sector K with a forest security officer and a local guide. When the officer mysteriously disappears, Neerav encounters a mythical creature that leaves him cursed, slowly unraveling his life. Despite his wife Anvi's support, he spirals into darkness, pushing everyone away. Desperate for a fresh start, Neerav takes a job at the city's dump lands, where he reunites with childhood friends Mugda and Kamli. Mugda runs a TV repair shop and dreams of finding a missing Bitcoin hard drive rumored to be buried in the wastelands. Kamli, now a nurse at an NGO, works tirelessly to raise funds for medical camps. As Neerav reconnects with them, he befriends young ragpicker Jitin and his sister. But his selfish pursuit of artistic success brings dangerous consequences. The curse still lingers, threatening to consume him entirely, forcing Neerav to confront his past and fate.
response.tagline: Creation, but not the hopeful kind
response.title: Srishti
